text: [NSL]:All trains along NSL will be stationary @ ard 11pm for ~10mins tonight for trial of the new signalling system. http://bit.ly/2nRJkhz
Full-day trials for the new signalling system to commence on the NSL on Sundays from 16 Apr for 2 mths. More info: http://bit.ly/2prUqb0 pic.twitter.com/7KavdsbEF1
